HeroSection.heroDescription: BorrowGo is a platform for exchanging goods and services between users

Footer.description: BorrowGo is a platform for exchanging goods and services between users. Rent professional equipment easily and safely.

HowItWorks.title: How it works
HowItWorks.desc1: Browse our comprehensive catalog to find exactly what you need.
HowItWorks.desc2: Select your dates and book immediately with secure payment.
HowItWorks.desc3: We deliver the equipment directly to your job site, on time.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.subtitle: Have questions or need assistance? Our team is here to help you!
ContactPage.name: Full Name
ContactPage.subject: Subject

AboutPage.title: About BorrowGo
AboutPage.subtitle: Your trusted partner for professional equipment rental and exchange.
AboutPage.missionContent: To empower professionals and individuals by providing a seamless, secure, and efficient platform for renting and exchanging high-quality equipment.
AboutPage.visionContent: To become the leading global community for collaborative consumption, where every tool and resource is shared sustainably.
AboutPage.reason1Desc: All equipment on our platform is inspected for quality and safety.
AboutPage.reason2Desc: Transactional security is our top priority for both lenders and borrowers.
AboutPage.reason3Desc: Access a diverse range of equipment from a local community of trusted users.
